eddie_torres_(defendant)_cross_exam.source_testimony: I remember being in the van with Officer Kane. He was asking about my time in juvie. Then everything went black. Next thing I knew, people were screaming and there was blood.

statements.text: I arrived on scene after the incident.

statements.text: Officer Kane was a good man.

statements.text: Eddie Torres has a history of violence against authority figures.
